item.title: 2 Day of 100 Days of Code
item.description: Day 2 of #100DaysOfCode started with&hellip; refresh my PHP knowledge. I made the documentation / wiki of the DiscordCustomRPC.py repository a little more understandable. I also updated the Python rewrite of the AntiScamBot backend, but it’s not yet merged.
